entities.name: dementor's kiss
entities.description: a process by which dementors destroy their victims' souls. ("It’s what dementors do to those they wish to destroy utterly.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: remus lupin, a wizard who is explaining the concept of the dementor's kiss to harry. ("They call it the Dementor’s Kiss," said Lupin, with a slightly twisted smile.)

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: supernatural creatures that suck out their victims' souls. (‘It’s what dementors do to those they wish to destroy utterly.")

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: a wizard who is in danger of being subjected to the dementor's kiss. (‘It was in the Daily Prophet this morning. The Ministry have given the dementors permission to perform it if they ﬁnd him.")

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: a wizarding newspaper that reported on sirius black's situation. (‘It was in the Daily Prophet this morning.")

relationships.description: dementors are targeting sirius black for the dementor's kiss. (‘The Ministry have given the dementors permission to perform it if they ﬁnd him.")
lupin is explaining the concept of the dementor's kiss to harry. (‘They call it the Dementor’s Kiss,’ said Lupin, with a slightly twisted smile.)
dementors are targeting sirius black for the dementor's kiss. (‘The Ministry have given the dementors permission to perform it if they ﬁnd him.")
